DataElement.preferredName: Other Health Condition Medical History Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/no/unknown indicator to signify other significant medical history.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Other Health Condition Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary. Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned. The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease._A state of being, such as a state of health. An account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Other Health Condition Personal Medical History
Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease.:A state of being, such as a state of health.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health.
A state of being, such as a state of health.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes/no/unknonw indicator of an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
